items.content_html: A lightweight frontend app using transformers.js showcasing the use of semantic similarity for geospatial applications such as geosocial media. Building on Overturempas Places, dynamically loading data from a singe 9Gb flatgeobuf file.

items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using Typescript with Express JS for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Postgres is used for DB, MongoDB Notification storage, Redis Caching, Socket IO for notification.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using Typescript with Express JS for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Postgres is used for DB, MongoDB Notification storage, Redis Caching, Socket IO for notification.
